contents: 1. fol. 1b-87a: [Persian translation of and commentary on Duʻāʼ al-ṣabāḥ]. Incomplete.
5. fol. 122b-124b: [Jawāb suʼāl Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd al-Nabī fī sharḥ ḥadīth ʻAlī].
7. fol. 126a-127a: [Jawāb suʼāl ʻammā rawāhu al-Ṣadūq fī al-Faqīh].
8. fol. 130b-154b: Ṭarīqah-i namāz-i shab va adʻiyah.
10. fol. 176a-177b: Dar kayf-i qulūb va qubūr va ṣafā-yi bāṭin. Instructions on prayer, likely extracted from a larger work.
13. fol. 210b-234b: Radd al-Yahūd: fuṣūl min asfār al-Yahūdīyah / Muḥammad Mahdī Ṭabāṭabāʼī. In Persian; consists of 11 faṣl. Dated Jumādá al-Ākhir 1230 H.
14. fol. 234b-235b: [Further notes on the Banī Isrāʼīl].
15. fol. 238b-287a: Sharḥ-i Kitāb-i Afṣaḥ al-shuʻarā Khvājah Ḥāfiẓ Shīrāzī.
16. fol. 290b-301b: Manāsik-i ḥajj / Muḥammad ʻAlī ibn Muḥammad Bāqir Iṣfahānī al-shahīr bih Bihbahānī. Dated 12 Shawwāl 1212 H.
extent: 302 leaves : paper ; 175 x 122 mm. bound to 175 x 123 mm.
subject: ʻAlī ibn Abī Ṭālib, Caliph, ca. 600-661—Duʻāʼ al-ṣabāḥ.
member_of_collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
